languages.text: В результате действий лояльных Империуму сил повстанцы были вытеснены в изолированные области, их лагеря были обнаружены и блокированы.

traits.locale_text: В результате действий лояльных Империуму сил, повстанцы были вытеснены в изолированных области, их лагеря были обнаружены и блокированы.

languages.text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.
languages.original_text: В результате действий лояльных Империуму сил повстанцы были вытеснены в изолированные области, их лагеря были обнаружены и блокированы.

traits.locale_text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.
As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.
As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.
As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.

languages.text: 帝国派の軍による戦闘行動の結果、反乱軍を離島地域に追い詰め、その先で反乱軍のキャンプを発見、封鎖した。
languages.original_text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.

traits.locale_text: 帝国派の軍による戦闘行動の結果、反乱軍を離島地域に追い詰め、その先で反乱軍のキャンプを発見、封鎖した。

languages.text: 由于帝国忠诚部队的行动，叛军被逼到了孤立的地区。随后，帝国军发现了叛军营地，将其封锁。
languages.original_text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.

traits.locale_text: 由于帝国忠诚部队的行动，叛军被逼到了孤立的地区。随后，帝国军发现了叛军营地，将其封锁。

languages.text: Gracias a la intervención de las fuerzas leales al Imperium, los rebeldes se vieron empujados a zonas aisladas, donde sus campamentos fueron posteriormente descubiertos y cercados.
languages.original_text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a la intervención de las fuerzas leales al Imperium, los rebeldes se vieron empujados a zonas aisladas, donde sus campamentos fueron posteriormente descubiertos y cercados.

languages.text: Als Resultat der Aktionen der dem Imperium loyal ergebenen Truppen wurden die Rebellen in isolierte Regionen vertrieben, wo anschließend ihre Lager ausfindig gemacht und eingekesselt wurden.
languages.original_text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.

traits.locale_text: Als Resultat der Aktionen der dem Imperium loyal ergebenen Truppen wurden die Rebellen in isolierte Regionen vertrieben, wo anschließend ihre Lager ausfindig gemacht und eingekesselt wurden.

languages.text: Suite aux actions des forces loyales à l'Imperium, les rebelles furent forcés de se réfugier dans des régions isolées, où leurs camps furent ensuite découverts et leurs accès, bloqués.
languages.original_text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.

traits.locale_text: Suite aux actions des forces loyales à l'Imperium, les rebelles furent forcés de se réfugier dans des régions isolées, où leurs camps furent ensuite découverts et leurs accès, bloqués.

languages.text: İmparatorluk'a sadık kuvvetlerin çabalarıyla isyancılar, ıssız bölgelere defedildi. Sonra da kampları saptanıp kuşatıldı.
languages.original_text: As a result of the actions of the forces loyal to the Imperium, the rebels were driven into isolated regions, where their camps were then discovered and blockaded.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk'a sadık kuvvetlerin çabalarıyla isyancılar, ıssız bölgelere defedildi. Sonra da kampları saptanıp kuşatıldı.
